title: Write TaskFilters Component Tests
description: Create tests for the TaskFilters component using React Testing Library.
instructions:
Write tests for TaskFilters that verify:
1. All filter dropdowns (status, priority) are rendered
2. Search input is rendered
3. Changing status filter calls onFilterChange with correct value
4. Typing in search input calls onFilterChange with updated search term

hints.text: Use fireEvent.change() to simulate selecting an option from a dropdown.
Remember that onFilterChange receives the entire filters object, not just the changed value.
